system.requirements:
Tier 1; None
Aptitudes: Toughness, General, Nurgle
system.effect:
Character gains one additional Wound. They may purchase this talent multiple times, up to twice their Toughness Bonus.
Display number of times this has been purchased as Sound Constitution (X), where X is number of times purchased.

description.value: Character gains one additional Wound. They may purchase this talent multiple times, up to twice their Toughness Bonus. Display number of times this has been purchased as Sound Constitution (X), where X is number of times purchased.
